Public Class SiteMapDataSource Inherits HierarchicalDataSourceControl Implements IDataSource, IListSource

summary.span: 提供資料來源控制項，讓 Web 伺服器控制項及其他控制項可用來繫結至階層式網站導覽資料。

span.span: Provides a data source control that Web server controls and other controls can use to bind to hierarchical site map data.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#introduction) - [指定的開始節點Specifying the Starting Node](#specifying_the_starting_node) - [擷取網站導覽資料Retrieving Site Map Data](#retrieving_site_map_data) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 簡介Introduction 控制項是網站導覽資料已針對您的站台的站台對應提供者所儲存的資料來源。The control is a data source to the site map data that is stored by the site map providers that are configured for your site. 可讓 Web 伺服器控制項不是特別網站巡覽控制項，例如， ，和繫結至階層式網站導覽資料的控制項。The enables Web server controls that are not specifically site navigation controls, such as the , , and controls, to bind to hierarchical site map data. 顯示站台對應的內容，或主動瀏覽網站，您可以使用這些 Web 伺服器控制項。You can use these Web server controls to display a site map as a table of contents or to actively navigate a site. 或者，您可以使用控制項，這是特別為網站巡覽控制項，並因此不需要的執行個體控制項。Alternatively, you can use the control, which is designed specifically as a site navigation control and therefore does not need an instance of the control. ## 指定的開始節點Specifying the Starting Node 繫結至網站導覽資料並呈現其根據指定的開始節點，在站台對應階層架構中的檢視。The binds to site map data and presents its view based on a specified starting node in the site map hierarchy. 根據預設，它是階層的根節點，但它也可以在階層內的任何節點。By default, it is the root node of the hierarchy but it can also be any node within the hierarchy. 開始節點由數個值屬性，如下所示：The starting node is identified by the values of several properties as follows: |開始節點Starting Node|屬性值Property Values| |-------------------|---------------------| |階層架構 （預設值） 的根節點。The root node of the hierarchy (the default setting).| 為 `false`。The is `false`.

並未設定。The is not set.| |表示目前所檢視的網頁的節點。The node that represents the currently viewed page.| 為 `true`。The is `true`.

並未設定。The is not set.| |階層的特定節點。A specific node of the hierarchy.| 為 `false`。The is `false`.

設定。The is set.| 如果屬性設定為 0 以外的值，它會影響開始節點與其站台資料階層架構對應所公開控制項。If the property is set to a value other than 0, it affects the starting node and with it the site map data hierarchy that is exposed by the control. 負數或正數的整數值識別的向上或向下由站台對應階層從開始節點的層級數和位移開始的子樹狀結構節點的屬性公開的資料來源控制項。The negative or positive integer value of the identifies the number of levels up or down the site map hierarchy from the starting node that is identified by the and properties to offset the starting node of the subtree that is exposed by data source control. 如果屬性設定為負數 *-n*，由資料來源控制項的樹狀子目錄的開始節點，則上階節點*n*上方已識別的階層式層級開始節點。If the property is set to a negative number *-n*, the starting node of the subtree that is exposed by the data source control is the ancestor node *n* hierarchical levels above the identified starting node. 如果該值*n*較大的階層式樹狀結構中的樹狀子目錄的開始節點的祖系層級數目超出站台對應階層的根節點。If the value *n* is greater than the number of ancestor levels in the hierarchical tree, the starting node of the subtree is the root node of the site map hierarchy. 如果屬性設定為正數 +*n*，開始節點樹狀子目錄公開的則子節點*n*低於所識別的開始節點的層級。If the property is set to a positive number +*n*, the starting node of the subtree that is exposed is a child node *n* levels below the identified starting node. 因為階層中可能存在的子節點的多個分支嘗試解析所識別的開始節點和節點之間，表示目前所要求的頁面上，如果可能路徑上的直接子節點。Because more than one branch of child nodes might exist in the hierarchy, the attempts to resolve a child node directly on the path between the identified starting node and the node that represents the currently requested page, if possible. 如果表示目前所要求之的網頁的節點不是識別的開始節點，值的子樹狀結構中屬性會被忽略。If the node that represents the currently requested page is not in the subtree of the identified starting node, the value of the property is ignored. 表示目前所要求的頁面上的節點是否小於*n*已識別的開始節點下的目前要求的頁面節點層級做為開始節點。If the node that represents the currently requested page is less than *n* levels below the identified starting node, the currently requested page node is used as the starting node. ## 擷取網站導覽資料Retrieving Site Map Data 網站導覽資料取自物件，例如，這是 ASP.NET 預設網站導覽提供者。Site map data is retrieved from an object, such as , which is the default site map provider for ASP.NET. 您可以指定任何已針對您的網站，以提供至網站導覽資料的提供者，而且可以取得可用的提供者的清單，藉由存取集合。You can specify any provider that is configured for your site to provide the site map data to the and can obtain the list of available providers by accessing the collection. 像所有的資料來源控制項、 每個執行個體與單一的協助程式物件，稱為資料來源檢視相關聯。Like all data source controls, every instance of a is associated with a single helper object, known as a data source view. 根據資料來源的屬性，是的網站導覽資料的檢視，並藉由呼叫擷取方法。The is a view on the site map data, according to the properties of the data source, and is retrieved by calling the method. 維護控制項繫結至的物件。The maintains the object that the controls bind to. 根據預設，開始的節點就是在階層的根節點，但是設任何節點的開始節點。By default, the starting node is the root node of the hierarchy, but you can set the starting node to any node. 起始點可以是相對於目前的位置在網站導覽中或絕對位置的節點。The starting point can be a node that is relative to the current position in the site map or to an absolute position. 您可以藉由設定指定的開始節點屬性。You can specify the starting node by setting the property. 專門用來瀏覽資料，並不支援一般的資料來源作業，例如排序、 篩選、 分頁、 快取，或資料記錄的作業，例如更新、 插入或刪除。The is specialized for navigation data, and does not support common data source operations such as sorting, filtering, paging, caching, or data record operations such as updates, insertions or deletions. ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以宣告方式繫結站台對應，使用的控制項控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively bind a control to a site map using a control. 網站導覽資料會擷取從根節點層級。The site map data is retrieved beginning at the root node level. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource_decl_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource_decl_1/CS/webform1smdscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource_decl_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource_decl_1/VB/webform1smdsvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 擷取可以當做資料清單來源使用的資料來源控制項清單。

span.span: Retrieves a list of data source controls that can be used as sources of lists of data.

returns.span: 可以當做資料清單來源使用的資料來源控制項之 。

span.span: An of data source controls that can be used as sources of lists of data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法來擷取一組物件，可用來當做來源控制項。Use the method to retrieve a set of objects that can be used as sources for the control. 站台對應資料來源控制項封裝的資料做為物件。Site map data source controls encapsulate their lists of data as objects. 因此，當一或多個相關聯物件，控制項代表清單的來源物件和方法會傳回包含一個項目的清單-的資料來源控制項本身。Therefore, when associated with one or more objects, a control represents a list source object and the method returns a list containing one element — the data source control itself. 方法會呼叫靜態方法來擷取可用來當做資料來源的物件清單。The method calls the static method to retrieve a list of objects that can be used as sources of data. 檢查是否方法會傳回有效的檢視名稱的集合。The checks whether the method returns a valid collection of view names. 若是如此，請會傳回清單，其中包含一個項目 — 。If it does, the returns a list containing one element — the .

span.span: The name of the site map provider that the binds to.

value.span: 根據預設，此值為 ，而且會使用站台的預設網站導覽提供者。

span.span: By default, the value is , and the default site map provider for the site is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值屬性儲存在檢視狀態。The value of the property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以宣告方式繫結網站導覽資料所提供的控制項預設提供者以外的物件。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively bind a control to site map data that is provided by an object other than the default provider. Web.config 檔案可讓自訂物件可用來`SiteMapDataSource`控制項：The Web.config file makes a custom object available to the `SiteMapDataSource` control: ``` ``` 程式碼`SimpleTextSiteMapProvider`類別，這個 Web.config 檔案範例會參考可在類別概觀。The code for the `SimpleTextSiteMapProvider` class that this Web.config file example references can be found in the class overview. 如果您使用 Visual Basic 範例，"VB"，而不是"CS"結尾之命名空間。If you use the Visual Basic example, the namespace ends in "VB" instead of "CS". 您也可以尋找範例內容中的"text.txt 」 站台對應檔案類別概觀。You can also find sample content for the "text.txt" site map file in the class overview. > [!NOTE] > `AsciiTextProvider`不是預設的提供者站台 （在此情況下） 會維持物件。The `AsciiTextProvider` is not the default provider for the site, which (in this case) remains the object. 的屬性控制項設定為自訂的網站對應提供者的名稱和資料繫結到對應的站台對應。The property of the control is set to the name of a custom site map provider, and the binds to the corresponding site map data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource_decl_3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource_decl_3/CS/webform3smdscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource_decl_3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource_decl_3/VB/webform3smdsvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: if the node tree is retrieved relative to the current page; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會在呼叫期間評估而方法，以協助判斷哪些網站導覽節點來當做起點使用指向建置節點樹狀結構。The property is evaluated during calls to the and the methods to help determine which site map node to use as a starting point to build the node tree. 並是互斥的屬性 — 如果您將設定屬性，請確認屬性是`false`。The and properties are mutually exclusive — if you set the property, ensure that the property is `false`. 值屬性儲存在檢視狀態。The value of the property is stored in view state.

Public Overridable Property StartingNodeOffset As Integer

member this.StartingNodeOffset : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定從開始節點位移的正整數或負整數，判斷資料來源控制項所公開的根階層架構。

span.span: Gets or sets a positive or negative integer offset from the starting node that determines the root hierarchy that is exposed by the data source control.

value.span: 預設值為 0，表示 所公開的根階層架構與開始節點相同。

span.span: The default is 0, which indicates that the root hierarchy exposed by the is the same as the starting node.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 如果屬性設定為 0 以外的值，它會影響開始節點與其站台資料階層架構對應所公開控制項。If the property is set to a value other than 0, it affects the starting node and with it the site map data hierarchy that is exposed by the control. 負數或正數的整數值識別的向上或向下由站台對應階層從開始節點的層級數和位移開始的子樹狀結構節點的屬性公開的資料來源控制項。The negative or positive integer value of the identifies the number of levels up or down the site map hierarchy from the starting node that is identified by the and properties to offset the starting node of the subtree that is exposed by data source control. 如果已識別的開始節點，則表示目前所要求的頁面上，節點會被忽略。If the identified starting node is the node that represents the currently requested page, the is ignored. 如果屬性設定為負數-*n*，由資料來源控制項的樹狀子目錄的開始節點，則上階節點*n*上方已識別的階層式層級開始節點。If the property is set to a negative number -*n*, the starting node of the subtree that is exposed by the data source control is the ancestor node *n* hierarchical levels above the identified starting node. 如果該值*n*較大的階層式樹狀結構中的樹狀子目錄的開始節點的祖系層級數目超出站台對應階層的根節點。If the value *n* is greater than the number of ancestor levels in the hierarchical tree, the starting node of the subtree is the root node of the site map hierarchy. 如果屬性設定為正數 +*n*，開始節點樹狀子目錄公開的則子節點*n*低於所識別的開始節點的層級。If the property is set to a positive number +*n*, the starting node of the subtree that is exposed is a child node *n* levels below the identified starting node. 因為階層中可能存在的子節點的多個分支嘗試解析所識別的開始節點和節點之間，表示目前所要求的頁面上，如果可能路徑上的直接子節點。Because more than one branch of child nodes might exist in the hierarchy, the attempts to resolve a child node directly on the path between the identified starting node and the node that represents the currently requested page, if possible. 如果表示目前所要求之的網頁的節點不是識別的開始節點，值的子樹狀結構中屬性會被忽略。If the node that represents the currently requested page is not in the subtree of the identified starting node, the value of the property is ignored. 表示目前所要求的頁面上的節點是否小於*n*已識別的開始節點下的目前要求的頁面節點層級做為開始節點。If the node that represents the currently requested page is less than *n* levels below the identified starting node, the currently requested page node is used as the starting node. 值屬性儲存在檢視狀態。The value of the property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的效果和屬性。The following code example demonstrates the effect of the and properties. 此範例是由數個 ASP.NET 網頁、 主版頁面、 主版頁面區段中和的 Web.sitemap 檔案所組成。The example consists of several ASP.NET pages, a master page, master page section, and a Web.sitemap file. Web.sitemap 檔案會定義站台的階層式結構。The Web.sitemap file defines the hierarchical structure of the site. 此程式碼範例，它會定義頁數，唯一的 Url，例如 1.aspx、 2.aspx、 A.aspx 和 B.aspx，所識別的如下所示：For this code example, it defines a number of pages identified by unique URLs, such as 1.aspx, 2.aspx, A.aspx, and B.aspx, as follows: Site.master 頁面包含並內的控制項控制項。The Site.master page contains the and a controls inside a control. 它會識別為 Default.aspx，公開的階層架構的開始節點使用屬性。It identifies the starting node of the exposed hierarchy as Default.aspx, using the property. Site.master 檔正由 Default.aspx 頁面。The Site.master file is used by the Default.aspx page only. 所有其他頁面，例如 1.aspx、 2.aspx、 A.aspx，並依此類推，使用 Section.master 主版頁面。All other pages, such as 1.aspx, 2.aspx, A.aspx, and so on, use the Section.master master page. 此主版頁面是 Site.master，非常類似，但是它包含數個控制項，您可以試驗。This master page is very similar to Site.master, however it contains several controls that you can experiment with. 一開始會顯示網站導覽資料的控制項繫結至`SiteMapDataSource1`，以指定為 1。The control that displays site map data is initially bound to `SiteMapDataSource1`, which specifies a of 1. 這表示，會顯示目前所要求之頁面的父節點。This indicates that the parent node of the currently requested page is displayed. 如果您檢視頁面 1.aspx，藉由顯示階層是 A、 1、 2。If you view page 1.aspx, the hierarchy displayed by the is A, 1, 2. 不過，如果您檢視頁面 4.aspx，階層是 B，3，4。However, if you view page 4.aspx, the hierarchy is B, 3, 4. 如果您變更for要`SiteMapDataSource2`，則控制項會以不同的方式顯示網站導覽資料。If you change the for the to `SiteMapDataSource2`, the control displays site map data differently. 當您使用`SiteMapDataSource2`，則屬性設定為`true`，這表示網站導覽資料會顯示相對於目前所要求的頁面和屬性設定為-1，表示為一個層級的子節點顯示，可能的話。When you use `SiteMapDataSource2`, the property is set to `true`, which means that the site map data is displayed relative to the currently requested page and the property is set to -1, indicating that one level of child nodes is displayed, when possible. 當您檢視 [A.aspx] 頁面上時，會顯示階層是目前的層級，包括所有同層級，例如 B 和 c 的階層當您檢視 1.aspx 時，不再顯示父節點。When you view the A.aspx page, the hierarchy that is displayed is the hierarchy of the current level, including all siblings, such as B and C. When you view 1.aspx, the parent nodes are no longer displayed. 下列程式碼範例示範您可以使用與其他元件，這個程式碼範例的 ASP.NET 網頁的其中一個。The following code example demonstrates one of the ASP.NET pages you can use with the other components of this code example. ``` <%@ Page MasterPageFile="~/Section.master" Title="Untitled Page" %>

1.aspx

 ```

summary.span: 取得或設定網站導覽中的節點，然後資料來源會使用該節點做為參考點，從階層式網站導覽擷取節點。

span.span: Gets or sets a node in the site map that the data source then uses as a reference point to retrieve nodes from a hierarchical site map.

value.span: 網站導覽中的節點 URL。

span.span: The URL of a node in the site map.

value.span: 會從網站導覽中擷取所識別的 及任何子節點。

span.span: The retrieves the identified and any child nodes from the site map.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性繫結至網站導覽資料，並提供其指定的開始節點，在站台對應階層為基礎的檢視。The property binds to site map data and presents its view based on a specified starting node in the site map hierarchy. 根據預設，開始的節點就是在階層的根節點，但是您可以設定開始節點，使用與任何節點屬性或 set屬性設`true`。By default, the starting node is the root node of the hierarchy, but you can set the starting node to any node with the property or set the property to `true`. 值屬性儲存在檢視狀態。The value of the property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以宣告方式設定屬性和繫結若要控制控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively set the property and bind a control to a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource_decl_6#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource_decl_6/CS/webform2smdsnocustomcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource_decl_6#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource_decl_6/VB/webform2smdsnocustomvb.aspx#1)]
